msbt.message: So tiny! Though I guess you'd have to be to hide in an anemone.
They don't really look that cool when they're swimming around
Being see-through makes these fellas look so fragile.
That color scheme! That elegant shape! The way it slices through the water! What a fish!
Its tail is like a little skirt. And a pretty cool-looking one at that! It's like a tiny, aqua trendsetter!
Is that fish wearing a party dress? It looks so fancy, like it's trying to make a splash at the ball!
I get a "suave, sporty guy" feel from this fish for some reason. I like it.
I was pretty sure I'd seen one of these before, but I guess not. They're bigger than I thought!
I bet this fish thinks it's some kind of royalty. I mean, just look at that face, .
Well THIS fish isn't gonna get lost in a crowd Just look at that pompadour!
You surprised there, fishy fella? I guess I did kinda sneak up on you
Now THIS is why I come to the museum! Look at the size of it! Justamazing.
Wow, kinda looks like an angry store manager. Like it's trying to say this place is "closed for business."
Well, this is the stuff of nightmares Yikes! No, thank you.
Kind of a dull-looking fish, but the dots are neat, .
Why do piranhas always look so angry? They need to learn how to chill.
Those teeth are all I can think about. Y'know, I bet a great white shark'd make a SUPER-scary bodyguard.
Check out the peepers on this fishy! Kinda reminds me of an old buddy, actually
Just how long is this thing? It just keeps going and going and going Whoa!
Sturgeons look tough, but I heard they're actually kinda gentle.
I learned that gar are kinda pointy when they're young, but they plump out as they get older. Neat!
I'm trying to have a staring contest with this hammerhead shark, but I can't figure out where to look
Hey, ! Someone said you were the one who caught this critter. That rocks!I feel like I'm learning a ton just staring at it Well, more like being hypnotized by its fishy ways.
